text: [Music]
Deanna and I arrived at 4 a.m. yesterday
morning in the capital city of Tehran
and from the moment I stepped foot on
Persian soil this smile has not left my
face the Middle East is one of my
favorite regions because you cannot
replicate their overwhelming kindness
hospitality and genuine friendliness to
go along with the culture deeply rooted
in ancient history I've heard a lot of
great things about Iran coming into this
trip so the bar was set high but the
expectations have already been met as
I'm discovering the hidden gems of the
city like the gold stone palette I'm
comfortably settling into my happy place
over the next two weeks we will be
joining a small group tour with gee
adventures with our awesome local guide
Amin we will be visiting these eight
places as we learn about Iran's history
eat their delicious foods and get to
know the unique people of Persia one of
the oldest civilizations on earth
2,000 years old I will be showing you
the true authentic life as it exists in
Iran apart from what you are currently
hearing on the news I will be visiting
magnificent sites and observing people
from small towns to big cities as I dig
deeper into this land of 80 million
people so are you as ready as I am for
this adventure get ready to witness my
best content yet i'm zhu ben ski and if
you like my travel videos please click
subscribe and join me as i plan to visit
every country in the world
